title: Globalism has ruined adventure and is making the world boring

media:group.media:title: Globalism has ruined adventure and is making the world boring
media:group.media:description:
Visit my blog on language learning here: https://www.mezzoguild.com
Just been reflecting lately on the fact that the world is, for the first time ever, completely and utterly discovered. We have every last inch of the planet (except for the ocean floor) mapped out and accessible with a swipe of the finger.
What does this mean for the future?
What does it mean for language learning and foreign cultures?
